CustomField.description: This field will keep the folder names mapped to their IDs. It will be a json string of an Object having a Map of List<string, string> and data would be in format =>Folder_Name, WrikeID
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field will keep the folder names mapped to their IDs. It will be a json string of an Object having a Map of List<string, string> and data would be in format =>Folder_Name, WrikeID
CustomField.label: Folder Map
